name: TweetRetriever
0:
”Alexa, ask Tweet Retriever to give me a random tweet”
”Alexa, ask Tweet Retriever for a random tweet”
”Alexa, get me a tweet by mkheck from Tweet Retriever”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tweet retriever
des:
This skill allows the user to request a random tweet from among the latest several posted by a specified Twitter user (handle). If no handle is specified, a random tweet from the Pivotal general Twitter account is returned.

No prerequisites, just ask for a random tweet!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
